div.p: Thanks for visiting the HMS web site. Our purpose is to promote a home-school-community connection vital to the success of our students. HMS is "committed to excellence” and works hard to make this site a primary source of timely information for all users.

div.style: font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 6px; font-family: inherit;

td.p: The Lady Eagles won the state championship in front of a spectator-free audience at The Pit on Saturday. It was the girls' second banner in three years and third in school history.

div.span: Broadmoor Elementary School was named a 2018 National Blue Ribbon School award winner on Monday. It was the only public school in New Mexico to earn the honor this year and is the first National Blue Ribbon school in Hobbs history. U
